author: kayyagari
msg: o fixed the grammar to store the filter properly by handling the attributes and control tags present in searchrequest
o added some warn level log statements
o throw IllegalStateException when a searchrequest doesn't contain a filter, changed the test case accordingly
o fixed a NPE in SearchResultEntryDsml while adding namespace to the doc root (in streaming mode there won't be a doc)
